blocks.name: bj-axc10
blocks.content: Alternate (shorter) proof of ~ axc10 . One can prove a version with DV(x,y) without ~ ax-13 , by using ~ ax6ev instead of ~ ax6e . (Contributed by BJ, 31-Mar-2021.) (Proof modification is discouraged.)

blocks.name: bj-alequex
blocks.content: A fol lemma. See ~ bj-alequexv for a version with a disjoint variable condition requiring fewer axioms. Can be used to reduce the proof of ~ spimt from 133 to 112 bytes. (Contributed by BJ, 6-Oct-2018.)

blocks.name: bj-spimt2
blocks.content: A step in the proof of ~ spimt . (Contributed by BJ, 2-May-2019.)

blocks.name: bj-hbsb3
blocks.content: Shorter proof of ~ hbsb3 . (Contributed by BJ, 2-May-2019.) (Proof modification is discouraged.)
